channel.title: Daniele Moser on mosis.xyz
channel.description: Recent content in Daniele Moser on mosis.xyz

item.title: Here's why you should learn Git
item.description: Introduction Over the course of my journey in Linux I discovered lots of interesting tools for production or for everyday tasks. But none of them compared to what Git gave me, and I'd even go as far as saying that it completely changed my perspective of working on a PC. Warning This is not a guide on how to use Git, there are tons of good guides out there, this article is about my point of view on Git.

item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: üôãüèº‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Who am I Hi, I’m Daniele, I’m a 22 year old guy based in Trentino, Italy. I work as an electronic designer and embedded software developer in LEOS where my daily work consists of production management of the electronics which control lasers for spectroscopy purposes (you can find more info in the work section). In my free time, you can find me running in the mountains, growing new technical skills but most importantly being a volunteer firefighter üöí.
